The Fenxi Zhengling Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Shanxi Province, specifically in Xiaoyi City

operators: Shanxi Fenxi Zhengling Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Fenxi Zhengling Coal Industry Company, which is a subsidiary of Shanxi Coking Coal Group.
